Mode.Description: raw source mode - either stream or single frame

ReadTimeoutInSec.Description: read timeout, when no data arrives for this duration - the stream closes, if 0 - no timeout

Port.Description: port on which the source is listening, the port is filled by the source

TimeoutInSec.Description: timeout to wait for a frame from the camera, or 0 for infinite timeout

Url.Description: [interface:]device[@stream] or empty for first available device

Source.Description: source pipeline part with {} marking the url

Url.Description: url to replace in Source string

OutputFramerate.Description: Framerate to output, if 0 - uses input framerate

Width.Description: target width or 0 to keep dimensions

Height.Description: target height or 0 to keep dimensions

KeepAspectRatio.Description: keep aspect ratio when resizing the image

RotateAngle.Description: an angle to rotate the frame,should be a multiple of 90 between 0 and 270

X.Description: ROI to extract from the image before further processing

Y.Description: ROI to extract from the image before further processing

Width.Description: ROI to extract from the image before further processing

Height.Description: ROI to extract from the image before further processing

FlowId.Description: flow id reported by this flow switcher
flow id reported by this flow switcher

Y.Description: ROI to extract from the image before inference

Width.Description: ROI to extract from the image before inference

Height.Description: ROI to extract from the image before inference

MaxDetections.Description: maximum detections to output per frame

ScoreThreshold.Description: detections with score below this threshold will be skipped

OutputFramerate.Description: Framerate to output, if 0 - uses input framerate

MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs.Description: report tracks that were updated at most MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs ms ago; when MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs is 0 - only assigned tracks are reported

InitTrackSize.Description: init track size, track will only become confirmed after this number of frames

InitThreshold.Description: threshold of InitTrackSize scores metric to make the track confirmed

InitMetric.Description: metric to apply to detection scores prior to comparing them to InitThreshold

MaxPredictedTimeMs.Description: track becomes closed after this period without updates

FeatureWeight.Description: feature weight in the combined gated cost (features vs Mahalanobis)or -1 for 'min'

MaxCosineDistance.Description: maximum cosine distance between detection and track features

MaxMahalanobisDistance.Description: maximum Mahalanobis distance between detection and track bounding boxes

MinIouThreshold.Description: minimum value of intersection over union between detection and track boundingboxes; only used for unconfirmed and unmatched tracks

MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs.Description: report tracks that were updated at most MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs ms ago; when MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs is 0 - only assigned tracks are reported

InitTrackSize.Description: init track size, track will only become confirmed after this number of frames

InitThreshold.Description: threshold of InitTrackSize scores metric to make the track confirmed

InitMetric.Description: metric to apply to detection scores prior to comparing them to InitThreshold

MaxPredictedTimeMs.Description: track becomes closed after this period without updates

FeatureWeight.Description: feature weight in the combined gated cost (features vs Mahalanobis)or -1 for 'min'

MaxCosineDistance.Description: maximum cosine distance between detection and track features

MaxMahalanobisDistance.Description: maximum Mahalanobis distance between detection and track bounding boxes

MinIouThreshold.Description: minimum value of intersection over union between detection and track boundingboxes; only used for unconfirmed and unmatched tracks

MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs.Description: report tracks that were updated at most MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs ms ago; when MaxTimeSinceUpdateToReportMs is 0 - only assigned tracks are reported

InitTrackSize.Description: init track size, track will only become confirmed after this number of frames

InitThreshold.Description: threshold of InitTrackSize scores metric to make the track confirmed

InitMetric.Description: metric to apply to detection scores prior to comparing them to InitThreshold

MaxPredictedTimeMs.Description: track becomes closed after this period without updates

FeatureWeight.Description: feature weight in the combined gated cost (features vs Mahalanobis)or -1 for 'min'

MaxCosineDistance.Description: maximum cosine distance between detection and track features

MaxMahalanobisDistance.Description: maximum Mahalanobis distance between detection and track bounding boxes

MinIouThreshold.Description: minimum value of intersection over union between detection and track boundingboxes; only used for unconfirmed and unmatched tracks

0@OutputFilter.Description: string in form 'class' or 'class/*' or 'class/attribute' to output'class' - filter specified class with any attribute'class/*' - filter specified class with undefined attribute'class/attribute' - filter specified class with specified attribute

ReidOnce.Description: true to only ReID the track once

Enable.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

N/A@Filters.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

ImageCenterPercentage.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

TimeSinceUpdateThreshold.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

IouThreshold.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

MaxFeaturesToExtractPerStep.Description: long term feature extractor manager configuration

TargetWidth.Description: width of target image, if 0 - PreprocessedFrame dimensions are used

TargetHeight.Description: height of target image, if 0 - PreprocessedFrame dimensions are used

SkipAllRendering.Description: if true - nothing will be rendered, but the frame will still be resized and copied forth

MarkPredictedTracks.Description: mark predicted tracks with a different color

ColorTrack.Description: map track ids to bounding boxes colors

DrawTrackVelocity.Description: draw an arrow in the direction of tracked object velocity

DrawCenterOfMass.Description: draw center of the bounding box

CenterOfMassRadius.Description: radius of the circle marking the center of mass

SkipRendering.Description: cross in the center of the frame

Color.Description: cross in the center of the frame

SizeInPercents.Description: cross in the center of the frame

Thickness.Description: cross in the center of the frame

SkipRendering.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

Corner.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

MarginX.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

MarginY.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

Bins.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

Width.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

Height.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

BackColor.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

BackTransparency.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

ColorBefore.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

ColorAfter.Description: histogram rendering settings; only used with grayscale images

Sink.Description: sink pipeline part with '{}' marking the url, can be 'websocketserversink' for web socket mode

Url.Description: url to replace in the Sink string

FrameRate.Description: target frame rate, 0 to use input framerate

KlvFormat.Description: klv format to output; pipeline has to have an 'appsrc' with 'meta/x-klv' caps defined to output klv data

FrameIdType.Description: frame id to use when identifying frames in the stored data

SkipFrames.Description: how many frames to skip while recording

FrameFileType.Description: image file type to use while storing frames

Quality.Description: if not -1 - video/jpeg quality in percents to pass to VideoWriter or to imwrite

VideoFps.Description: FPS to use when storing frames as video
